How many people are affected by fibrochondrogenesis ?,Fibrochondrogenesis appears to be a rare disorder. About 20 affected individuals have been described in the medical literature.,GHR,fibrochondrogenesis
What are the genetic changes related to fibrochondrogenesis ?,"Fibrochondrogenesis can result from mutations in the COL11A1 or COL11A2 gene. These genes provide instructions for making components of type XI collagen, which is a complex molecule that gives structure and strength to th
